name: smartsites-mn
short_description: With over 25 years in business I have put together step by step instruction for a person to launch his or her own business.  I have everything available to you from your computer and you won't have to leave your desk.  I also have legal products, marketing products, apparel, web site construction and much, much more.  I also am available via chat or email for you to run ideas or suggestions by me.  The information on my site is from my experiences and unfortunately I learned the right things by making mistakes.  No you don't have to spend money fruitlessly as I did.  Every business is obviously different but start up is generally the same.  Good luck and we'll see you at the top.
